content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'ariel_adlstrnsolar_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [ariel_adlstrnsolar_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://ariel@adlstrnsolar.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.d_vendas_itens (
	[NUM_VENDA] int,
	[NUM_SEQ] int,
	[ID_PROD] int,
	[QTDE] numeric(10,2),
	[VAL_UNIT] numeric(10,2),
	[VAL_TOTAL] numeric(10,2)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'bronze/Vendas_Itens/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [ariel_adlstrnsolar_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM bronze.d_vendas_itens
GO
